title: Boston University Presidential Scholarship 2025 in USA (Funded)
excerpt:
University: Boston University
Degree: Undergraduate
Coverage: $25,000
All Nationalities
Deadline: 1 Dec 2025
full_content: Applications are invited to apply for Boston University Presidential Scholarship 2025 in United States. The University sponsors a wide range of funded scholarships for international students. This scholarship provides $25,000 per year for undergraduate degree students, welcoming applicants from all nationalities. Deadline to apply: 1st December 2025. Visit official website to apply: https://www.bu.edu/admissions/tuition-aid/scholarships-financial-aid/first-year-merit/presidential/
author: AWB Travels and Tours Ltd

title: Millions May Face EU Visa Free Travel Restrictions Soon
excerpt: The EU just hit the brakes on unlimited visa-free travel. A new agreement may change how third-country nationals visit the Schengen Zone.

title: Poland Study Visa New Rules in Effect from July 1, 2025
excerpt: Poland drops a visa rule update. If you’re from Nigeria, India, or elsewhere, here's what you need to know before applying to study in Poland.

title: NASA Postdoctoral Program 2025 Deadline Extended
excerpt: NASA gives more time for international postdoc applicants to apply for the prestigious NPP. New deadline announced.

title: Gotoh Tokyu Group Fully-funded Scholarship 2026 in Japan
excerpt: Earn your Master's and PhD at Tokyo City University under the prestigious Gotoh Tokyu Group scholarship. Apply now!

title: English Language Rules Changed for New Zealand AEWV
excerpt: New English requirements now apply to AEWV visa applicants in New Zealand starting July 2025. Don’t miss these new changes.

title: Gabon Launches Free Tourist e-Visa Until Sept 30, 2025
excerpt: Visitors to Gabon can now apply for a free e-Visa valid till Sept 30, 2025, as part of its tourism promotion plan.

title: Portugal Extends Residence Permit Validity to Oct 15, 2025
excerpt: Holders of expired permits in Portugal get automatic extensions until Oct 15, 2025, with more renewal opportunities.

title: Polish Single Permit Now Requires National Work Visa
excerpt: Poland’s updated rule requires foreign workers to apply via a national work visa before Single Permit applications.

title: UK Cuts 111 Occupations from Skilled Worker Route
excerpt: Big immigration shake-up in the UK: over 100 roles including care workers removed from Skilled Worker list.

title: IndiGo Launches Direct Mumbai–Manchester Flights
excerpt: IndiGo connects Mumbai and Manchester with direct long-haul flights 3x weekly, making UK–India travel easier.

title: University of Genova Scholarships 2026 in Italy (Funded)
excerpt: Apply for undergraduate, master's or PhD at University of Genova with full funding. Open to all international students.

title: Sir Edward Youde Memorial Scholarships 2026 in Hong Kong
excerpt: Fully funded scholarship program in Hong Kong to support postgraduate study. Apply by fall 2025.

title: ANZSOG Academic Fellows Program 2026 in Australia
excerpt: Join the ANZSOG Academic Fellows Program 2026 and build leadership experience in the public sector.

title: Emirates Internship 2026 in UAE Now Open (Paid)
excerpt: Get paid work experience in the UAE with Emirates Group. International applicants eligible for 2026 intake.

title: Macquarie University Research Scholarship 2025–26 (Fully Funded)
excerpt: Study in Australia for free. Macquarie University is offering fully funded research scholarships for 2025–26.
